furniture.Catalogue.name: Happy Home Catalogue
furniture.Catalogue.desc:
Provides unlimited access to
many wallpapers & floors, and
almost every furniture item...
from the convenience of your
home!
config.CloseWithKey.name: Close With Key
config.CloseWithKey.desc: Allow the menu to be closed with the menu close keys.
config.GiveModifier.name: Give Modifier
config.GiveModifier.desc: Holding this key when clicking will put the item in your inventory.
config.FavoriteModifier.name: Favorite Modifier
config.FavoriteModifier.desc: Holding this key when clicking will favorite or unfavorite the item.
config.ExtendedCategories.name: Extended Categories
config.ExtendedCategories.desc: While enabled, replaces the default furniture filter tabs with more granular filters.
config.FurnitureTooltips.name: Furniture Tooltips
config.FurnitureTooltips.desc: While enabled, displays tooltips for hovered items in the furniture catalog.
config.PauseTime.name: Pause Time
config.PauseTime.desc: While enabled, pauses time when the catalog is open. No effect in multiplayer.
config.ReplaceFurnitureCatalog.name: Replace Furniture Catalog
config.ReplaceFurnitureCatalog.desc: While enabled, replaces the default furniture catalog UI with the new one.
config.ReplaceWallpaperCatalog.name: Replace Walls & Floors Catalog
config.ReplaceWallpaperCatalog.desc: While enabled, replaces the default wallpaper catalog UI with the new one.
logging.alternativeTextures.versionWarni: The current version of Happy Home Designer only supports Alternative Textures {{min}} or newer. You currently have version {{current}}, and Alternative Textures integration will not be applied. Please update Alternative Textures to re-enable integration.
logging.removedWallsAndFloors: Found and removed {{walls}} duplicate wallpapers and {{floors}} duplicate floors.
config.ToggleShortcut.name: Catalog toggle shortcut
config.ToggleShortcut.desc: Keyboard shortcut to show/hide the catalog while it is open.
ui.search.name: Search
item.card.receive: You are now a member of the Rare Curio Collector's Society! A new catalogue is available from Robin.
item.card.name: Collector's Card
item.card.desc: A membership card for the RCCS. Grants access to the collector's catalogue.
furniture.CollectorsCatalogue.name: Collector's Catalogue
furniture.CollectorsCatalogue.desc: A collector's catalog for rare and exotic curios.
furniture.DeluxeCatalogue.name: Designer's Dream Catalogue
furniture.DeluxeCatalogue.desc: A catalogue truly worthy of the finest home.
mail.collectorAcceptance.text: The Rare Curio Collector's Society of Ferngill wishes to formally recognize @ for their outstanding collection of rare and unique home decor. As an award for this collection, and an unwavering dedication to the preservation of history, the Society hereby extends an official offer of membership to @.
mail.collectorAcceptance.name: RCCS membership mail
mail.fairyDust.text: Greetings, @.^It seems you've discovered the perfect catalogue. Or rather, almost perfect. My alchemy experiments indicate that it may be possible to convert it into a more... pocketable form, with the help of the magical properties of Fairy Dust. If you attempt such a thing, please inform me of the results.^	-Rasmodius
mail.fairyDust.name: Fairy Dust & Catalogues
config.ReplaceRareCatalogs.name: Replace Rare Catalogues
config.ReplaceRareCatalogs.desc: While anabled, replaces the default rare catalog UIs with the new one.
config.AlwaysLockScroll.name: Always Lock Scroll
config.AlwaysLockScroll.desc: When disabled, scroll wheel is only captured when hovering over the menu. When enabled, scroll wheel is always captured while the menu is open.
item.portable.name: Architect's Catalogue
item.portable.desc: A portable catalogue truly worthy of the finest home.
config.ClientMode.name: Client Mode
config.ClientMode.desc: Disables content features so the mod can be safely used on servers that don't have it installed.
config.EarlyDeluxe.name: Early Deluxe Catalogue
config.EarlyDeluxe.desc: Adds the collector's catalogue's contents to the standard combined catalogue.
config.LargeVariants.name: Large Variants
config.LargeVariants.desc: Increases the height of the variant panel. Covers up some HUD elements.
config.cheats.name: Cheats
config.tweaks.name: Tweaks
config.OpenMenu.name: Open Menu Key
config.OpenMenu.desc: Opens the Designer's Dream Catalogue for free from anywhere, and ignores unlock conditions.
